ygData.subject: Re: Suggestions for a level 6 baby bard
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, at level 6 your supposed to be hunting stuff in qeynos hills but there are those two annoying druids NPCs that will KOS (Kill on sight) anyone fighting
ygData.messageBody:
Well, at level 6 your supposed to be hunting stuff in qeynos hills but
there are those two annoying druids NPCs that will KOS (Kill on sight)
anyone fighting animals. I found that area very annoying so I suggest
that you dash through BB (it's a fairly safe short run at peak time
when all the surface gnolls are camped.) and get yourself bound in
Halas. Then hunt the various Ice goblin camps and the edges of the
open area for possible blue/white critters. It's a beautiful zone and
the snow makes it easier to see in the dark.

If you feel like some travel to a very empty zone take the ship to
Eurdin, work your way through the city to the Tox forest. As you come
out the gate head straight south through the newbie zone till you hit
the bridge that crosses the river (roughly 0 100), cross and hunt the
kobald camps and poachers (their heads are a good quest item at your
level.

Just a couple of suggestion, there are many other areas. Umm actually
if you feel rally brave you can sprint to Misty Thicket near
Rivervale. I think it is the best place to level up to 10-12th in the
game.

Bujold 18th
Xegony


______________________________ Reply Separator _________________________________
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Suggestions for a level 6 baby bard
Author: Non-HP-Talien (Talien@...) at HP-ColSprings,mimegw5
Date: 7/23/99 11:37 AM


From: Talien <Talien@...>

Heya,

You fine folks have any suggestions for a level 6 Bard on where to hunt?
Im was born in, and live around the Qeynos area. I have been helping keep
the rat population down, and lately have been working on keeping the
dreaded Black Burrow entrance free of Scouts and Guards. However I am in
need of greater adventure. As a bard, I need great adventures to write
songs about.

ooc: So if I help someone who is a level 23 warrior find their body, and
they give me stuff, is this considered twinking?

ooc2: Ever notice how many of us bards have names that start with T?

-Talien (Bloodguard) Innorook
